description: The Talus AT Low is a versatile hiker loaded with features for on-the-move comfort. The shoe’s leather upper provides durability in a low-cut, lighter weight silhouette than its mid-height Talus AT counterpart. A Vibram Mega Nuasi outsole ensures solid footing across varying terrain with aggressive traction and toe protection.
name: Vasque Talus AT Low, Wide - Mens
